name: KeyMash
description:
Install instructions

HOW TO PLAY

- Write words to deal damage to the enemy.

- Collect letters to use them.

- Collected letters will show on the keyboard and the amount of letters you have.

- With every enemy you kill, you get additional letters.

- Score is added when you kill an enemy.

- If the timer runs out you lose a life.

- You have 5 lives.

- Have fun :)
